basic.blooming: Flowering period July-August, fruiting period August-November
basic.color: Flower color light red or purple red, flower color white, yellow, red, purple

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 5.2-6.7
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Strong resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
